mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scomment (snum, userId, cnum, cContent) VALUES (#{snum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId}, (SELECT NVL(max(cnum), 0)+1 FROM scomment), #{cContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT snum, userId, cnum, regDate, cContent FROM scomment WHERE snum = #{snum}
mapper.update: UPDATE scomment SET cContent=#{cContent} WHERE cnum=#{cnum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM scomment WHERE cnum=#{cnum} and userId=#{userId}
